table Products = with
  [| as Product, as Color    , as Price |]
  [| "shirt"   , "white,grey", 10.50    |]
  [| "pants"   , "blue"      , 15.00    |]
  [| "hat"     , "red"       , 5.25     |]

schema Products with
  Article : text
  Color : text
  Price : number

schema '/clean/Products.ion' with
  schema Products

write Products as '/clean/Products.ion' with
  Article = Products.Product
